body:
I really like forced tickle machine mangas. But the sad thing is- they are very hard to find. And even you find some good mangas of these topics but you dont understand what are the characters saying because its not written in English. fans like me dont care about how good or bad your English translation is. All we want is we need some good mangas on this topic and a simple English translation so anyome can understand the manga. Nobody cares about Grammar mistakes. So dont worry.

I LOVE your art, characters, story, colouring, specially the loli gitls armpit drawing and their embarrassing tickle smile.  Please please please Make a new chapter and some more of this mangas.

There's another thing i want to tell but "IF YOU ASK FOR TRANSLATIONS, YOU WILL DIE" so i dont want to tell it hahaha.. I hope you understand what i tried to say 😂😂😂
 
All the best and please keep my request. LOVE YOU ZETUBOU
